biotools.summary: ScReQTL is an application to assess the correlation between gene expression and expression of biallelic SNV loci (Variant Allele Fraction, VAFRNA) located within transcribed genomic regions from scRNA-seq data. This tool is an approach to correlate SNVs to gene expression from individual scRNA-seq datasets.

bioschemas.name: scReQTL
